benchmark_details.name: CFinBench: A Comprehensive Chinese Financial Benchmark for Large Language Models
benchmark_details.overview: CFinBench is a meticulously crafted evaluation benchmark for assessing the financial knowledge of LLMs under the Chinese context, consisting of 99,100 questions spanning 43 second-level categories with three question types.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the financial domain knowledge of large language models in the context of Chinese financial tasks.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Focuses on the Chinese financial system; not suitable for assessing financial knowledge in other countries.

data.source: Mock exams and publicly available materials, including real-world examination questions.
data.annotation: Rigorous data processing pipelines including cleaning, de-duplication, LLM-assisted question rephrasing, option shuffling, and human cross-validation.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the match between model prediction and gold answer.
methodology.interpretation: An accuracy score is interpreted based on model performance in different categories.
methodology.baseline_results: The highest average accuracy reported for GPT4 is 60.16%.
